logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (440383) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (440383) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Depressive disorder prevalent cohort, defined as the earliest condition occurrence of Depressive disorder conceptset with no treatment more than 30 days prior and no prior psychosies/mania
Depressive disorder without bipolar design diagnostics 1 cohort
logicDescription: Depressive disorder, excludes schizoaffective, reactive depressive psychosis, chronic depressive personality disorder, bipolar and atypical depressive disorder
